title: Kyle Conner (Cross-country EV record holder)
description:
Kyle Conner drove his Tesla Model 3 long range from New York to Redondo Beach in a record-setting 45 hours 10 min. He holds the record for the fastest trans-continental drive in an electric car on the original Cannonball Route.

https://www.theverge.com/2019/8/5/20751975/ev-cannonball-run-record-broken-twice-2019

 

WATCH the show! : https://youtu.be/62ofrHCAxcA

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @virtualkyle

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
